properties.address: Bridgwater Library, Bridgwater, Somerset TA6 3LF
properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October – March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. On Monday afternoons we run free Low Impact Activity Sessions (2-3pm) for those that might need a bit of help to get moving. Booking required, email brwlib@somerset.gov.uk for more information. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Bridgwater Library

properties.address: Taunton Brewhouse, Taunton, Somerset TA1 1JL
properties.description: We operate a Community Drop In session at The Brewhouse Theatre, Taunton on Wednesdays between 11.00 to 13.00 with a full range of advice, signposting, support, training, art/craft and mental health and wellbeing activities for anyone feeling isolated, excluded, lonely, discriminated against in particular for protected characteristic groups per the Equality Act 2010
properties.title: Community Drop In

properties.address: Bridgwater Town Council, Somerset TA6 3AS
properties.description: We are pleased to confirm we are relaunching our Warm Space at Bridgwater Town Hall on 14th October 2025. Come along and enjoy a warm space where you can get a free hot drink, charge your phone, read a newspaper, use a laptop, and chat to other members of the community. We have an exciting monthly agenda which includes arts and craft sessions as well as a Kindness Kitchen where you can enjoy a hot bowl of soup and bread roll. We will also be hosting local charities and organisations to share useful advice on topics such as keeping your home warm this winter, along with details of other useful services available in the area. All ages and backgrounds are welcome.
properties.title: Community Warm Space

properties.address: Victoria Park Community Centre, Bridgwater, Somerset TA6 7AS
properties.description: We operate a Welcome Hub for refugees and asylum seekers on Mondays between 09.00 and 13.00 with free refreshments and a full range of advice, support, training, art/craft and mental health and wellbeing activities.
properties.title: Diversity Voice Welcome Hub

properties.address: Langport library, Langport, Somerset TA10 9RA
properties.description: This space is open to all and is situated in the centre of Langport. When you become a library member we offer free WIFI and public computers, alongside access to a selection of activities and groups. We have a study area, books, online council access help via video link and comfy chairs. Membership is free and items to borrow include books, eBooks, audio books, blood pressure monitors and iPads. During the winter months we are a warm space for all and offer a warm winter coat exchange.
properties.title: Langport Library

properties.address: Somerset County Council, Somerset TA10 9RA
properties.description: The space is open to all
properties.title: Langport Library

properties.address: North Petherton Community Centre, Somerset TA6 6QA
properties.description: Public computers & Wifi available for library members. Various groups meet up please contact the library for more information, everyone welcome.
properties.title: North Petherton Library

properties.address: Rowbarton Methodist Church, Taunton, Somerset TA2 6LA
properties.description: If you would like coffee or tea, cake and a quiz, come and join us on the first or third Wednesday of the month from 10.30 - 12.00. It's free!
properties.title: Rowbarton Methodist Church Taunton

properties.address: St Francis of Assisi Church Hall, Somerset TA6 4JA
properties.description: Space Open to all, puzzles, games, refreshments. Free parking on road outside. Level access and disabled toilet.
properties.title: Saxon Green Community Hub

properties.address: St George's Church Hall, Taunton, Somerset TA1 3JT
properties.description: Come and enjoy a bowl of soup and a cup of tea with us term time on Thursdays.Food, company and warmth...all for FREE! Soup is about bringing the whole community together and what better way to do that than with a cuppa and a bowl of soup!
properties.title: Soup

properties.address: St. Marys Church, Somerset TA6 3EQ
properties.description: Building is open throughout the week also with tea & coffee and refreshments available
properties.title: St Mary's Church

properties.address: St. Marys Church, Bridgwater, Somerset TA6 3EQ
properties.description: A Wellbeing space on Mondays and Wednesdays 10.00 am - 2.00 pm. This is a really welcoming space where we offer free toast, teas and coffees. There are people to chat to, play games with, craft activities, signposting, quiet reflection, someone to listen to you. Tuesdays 12.00 midday - 2.00 pm, Thursdays 10.00 am - 2.00 pm with cafe open offering lunches and cakes at amazing prices.
properties.title: St Mary's Church Wellbeing

properties.title: St Peter and St Paul, Bishops Hull

properties.address: Taunton Brewhouse, Coal Orchard, Taunton TA1 1JL
properties.description: Open from 2nd December 2024 to 28th February 2025 9am to 4pm Monday to Friday Come along to our warm and friendly space. You're welcome to drop into our cafe for some subsidised warm food and drinks, relax in our Westward Room and use our free WiFi
properties.title: Taunton Brewhouse Theatre

properties.address: Taunton Library, Taunton, Somerset TA1 3XZ
properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October – March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. On Wednesday afternoons we run free Low Impact Activity Sessions (2-3pm) for those that might need a bit of help to get moving. Booking required, email taulib@somerset.gov.uk for more information. We also have scales to weigh your baby during opening hours (instructions available). Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Taunton Library

properties.address: Temple Methodist Church, Somerset, Somerset TA1 3PY
properties.description: The space is open on Wednesdays, between 10.30 and 13.30. Morning tea/coffee, conversation, activities, and lunch. It is primarily for over 50's, but all are welcome. On Thursdays, from 10.00 - 12noon, another opportunity to spend time in company with refreshments, indoor kurling and jigsaws. All welcome.
properties.title: Temple Methodist Church

properties.address: Trull Church Community Centre, Somerset TA3 7JZ
properties.description: Our cafe - The Hive - is open to all with no requirement that you have to purchase anything. If any of our other rooms - the East Hall or Upper Meeting Room - are not being used by a hirer, you are welcome to use either of those rooms.
